mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:
Dear Shubham,

I hope this email finds you well.

Thank you for providing the internal data to update the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC. Please find below the updated checklist, which now includes the current status of each item:

### Updated Checklist Table
| Checklist Item                       | Status     | Comment                                                                                                           | Source                          |
|--------------------------------------|------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------|
| Company Address Proof                | Validated  | Address proof is available with utility bill issued by London City Utilities.                                    | DIM_CompanyAddressProof         |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated  | Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available.                                                  | DIM_CompanyAnnualAccountsAndElliproSurvey |
| Company Bank and Postal Details      | Validated  | Bank account and SWIFT code are verified and match the headquarters address.                                     | DIM_CompanyBankAndPostalDetails |
| Company Directorship                 | Pending    | Directorship data is available but requires further verification of the documents provided.                      | DIM_CompanyDirectorship         |
| Company Tax Documentation            | Pending    | Tax documents are partially verified, pending additional reviews and renewals.                                   | DIM_CompanyTaxDocuments         |
| Company Regulatory Compliance        | Pending    | Regulatory compliance data includes status as compliant, but some regulations are still under review.            | DIM_CompanyRegulatory           |
| Company Business Scope               | Pending    | Business scope information is available but pending verification of the operation scale and employee range.      | DIM_CompanyBusinessScope        |
| Company PEP Screening                | Validated  | PEP screening data is available with high-risk ratings for certain individuals.                                  | Attached Data                   |
| Company Revenue Details              | Validated  | Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported.                     | Annual Report                   |
| Company Market Capitalization Details | Validated  | Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.                            | Annual Report                   |

If you require any further information or have additional queries, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Surbhi Nagori
surbhi.nagori@capgemini.com
